channel.title: Playlist Producer on Vivian Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Playlist Producer on Vivian Nguyen

item.title: Spotify Playlist Producer
item.description: Overview Hello! This is my “Playlist Producer.” I developed this project over the course of several weeks in my Spring 2022 semester, as a sophomore. At this point, I have newly rediscovered my love for computational thinking and problem solving, and want to apply my Python skills to a fun problem I’ve had for a while – my lack of new music.

item.title: COVID-19 Concern and Citizen Trust in Different Institutions
item.description: COVID-19 Concern and Trust in Different Citizen Institutions Overview February 2022 Note: I wrote this paper for Government 1372: Political Psychology, a data science in the Harvard Government department. At this point, I was gaining proficiency in R, but had not developed a sophisticated understanding of statistics and causal inference yet.
